items.title: New Madeleine McCann search under way in Portugal
items.description: Authorities say the new search will be across 21 plots and will continue until Friday.

items.title: Ukraine says it hit Crimea bridge with underwater explosives
items.description: Kyiv's security service says it it used more than 1,000kg of TNT to mine the supports of Russia's Kerch Bridge.

items.title: Jeremy Bowen: Killings near Gaza aid centre will deepen criticism of Israel's new distribution system
items.description: Western diplomats are looking on with dismay at the killing of hungry Gazans near aid hubs, writes Jeremy Bowen.

items.title: 'Struggling to be alive': Kenyan activist speaks of 'sexual torture' in Tanzania
items.description: Boniface Mwangi says he has decided to speak despite the "shame and guilt" of being "sexually tortured".

items.title: Japanese baseball legend Shigeo Nagashima dies aged 89
items.description: Known as Mr Giants, Nagashima was one of Japan's most famous sports stars during the 1960s and 70s.
